subject: Info Order
description_text:
Hi, when will orders SSN1730 and SSN1646 be delivered?

Foggia Ivan

conversations.body_text: Hi Ivan Foggia,    Here's a link to your logistics tracking, all expected to arrive for you around the 26th.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=YT2516400705197098,SF6045775297537
